details:
Intro Call
- Has been in startup space for awhile 
- Series A crunch makes it tough to get liquidity for startups
- Liquidity models are tough barrier to entry 
- Not sure of their approach, but they're looking at prospectively building with multiple protocols (mentioned paradigm by name)
- Discussed the grant program and tokenized securities models
- Will check back in later to see where we can find closer alignment
- Sounds extremely early and not terribly educated about the prospective infrastructure requirements for issuing tokenized securities

Follow On: EAP Wallet // Infrastructure

- Based on our priorities, Balance could help create a stronger user interface, short positions, CDPs
- Test nets, local nets as a 1st step
- Single destination for various categories of relayer interaction
- Niche financial tool access

- Next Steps: Probably start with test net and then run from there

Intro Meeting

- Followed up with Tyler from Shapeshift re: TW integration with KeepKey & Shapeshift trading team opportunities around liquidity sourcing + provision
- Interesting opportunity to explore re: Shapeshift using excess inventory to market make on DEXes, crypto native + lots of excess could be alternative monetization path for them
- They have a joint slack with most of their partners so will work to get at least Tom + Jacob + Me added
- On the TW side will need to explore with the Keep Key Dev team

Intro Meeting

- Bitski competitor focused on wallet SDK secured by HSMs 
- Funding from Lightspeed, SV Angel
- 1x founder with exit from previous company sold to Docker
- Team of 8 with co-founders from Yelp + Uber
- Onboarding enabled through phone number rather than email, doesn't seem to be single sign on
- Looking to bundle instant / 0x for easier access to other ERC-20 + 721 assets
- Probably good to have them go through boost program to make bundling official

Twitter DM

Hey Clay, the article you wrote about 22 ideas to explore with 0x was very inspiring. I'm currently working on a project that let developers interact with dapps without requiring MetaMask and am thinking about deeper integration with 0x to help make these use cases even better. The project is https://fortmatic.com  and I'd love to hear what you think and explore possibilities of working together!

Intro Meeting

- Hydrogen interested in adding one click buy functionality to their FinTech dApp store
- As a follow up we'll stay in touch should they have questions but seem pretty self sufficient.

Intro Meeting

- Instant overview, likely need to route through RexRelay or another community member
- Probabilistic micropayments
- Help with intros to folks market making when it makes sense

Intro Meeting
-  Andrew leads BD for Partial F
- Isaac is a core Dev
- PF is in stealth mode right now, decentralized derivatives, doing so in a different way
- Inverse BTC price token, long is a CDP like smart contract called a CDD (collateralized dynamic debt)
- Dai is deposited Short tokens are minted and sold on the market  / CDD creates long Short tokens = short 
- If demand for short is greater than long, creates arb opportunity, allows folks to arb the spread 
- MVP by January
- GTM / User experience - will be on some sort of DEX, listed as an ERC-20 Token, users will be more so on the institutional side 
- Intro to EverBloom, Radar Relay, Paradex
- Jacob follow up 
- Grant program
